title: Knoxville, Tennessee
summary: Knoxville is a city in and the county seat of Knox County in the U.S. state of Tennessee.[15] As of the 2020 United States census, Knoxville's population was 190,740,[16] making it the largest city in the East Tennessee Grand Division and the state's third largest city after Nashville and Memphis.[17] Knoxville is the principal city of the Knoxville Metropolitan Statistical Area, which had an estimated population of 869,046 in 2019.[18]
